Package com.esplibrary.bluetooth

Class V1connectionBaseWrapper

java.lang.Object
com.esplibrary.bluetooth.V1connectionBaseWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Handler.Callback, IV1connectionWrapper, Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
V1connectionDemoWrapper, V1connectionLEWrapper, V1connectionWrapper
public abstract class V1connectionBaseWrapper extends Object implements IV1connectionWrapper, android.os.Handler.Callback, Runnable

    • getCachedRSSI

      public int getCachedRSSI()
      Description copied from interface: IV1connectionWrapper
      Returns the last read RSSI for the connected remote BLE device. If no connection a value of '-127' will always be returned.
      Specified by:

    • readRemoteRSSI

      public boolean readRemoteRSSI(RSSICallback callback)
      Description copied from interface: IV1connectionWrapper
      Asynchronously reads the connected remote BLE devices RSSI and invokes callback once the value has been read.
      Specified by:
      readRemoteRSSI in interface IV1connectionWrapper
      Parameters:
      callback - the callback that will be invoked with the read back RSSI value.
      Returns:
      True if an Asynchronously read has taken place. If false is returned, check the log output for a hint as to why the call failed.

    • removeExpiredPackets

      protected void removeExpiredPackets()
      Clears the expired ESPPackets inside of the echo list.

      NOTE: This method will update the packets transmission time if the TS Holdoff flag is set.

    • malformedData

      protected void malformedData(byte[] data)
      Send a message to perform the bad data callback based on the provided byte array.
      Parameters:
      data - The bad ESP data.

    • determinedV1Type

      public boolean determinedV1Type()
      Indicates if wrapper has determined the V1's type... We know if the V1 has checksum, or is Legacy.
      Returns:
      True if V1 type has been determined.
      See Also:
      • DeviceId.VALENTINE_ONE_LEGACY
      • DeviceId.VALENTINE_ONE_NO_CHECKSUM
      • DeviceId.VALENTINE_ONE
